txt_en: Failure is the fog through which we glimpse triumph.
txt_cn: 透过失败的迷雾，才能瞥见胜利的光辉。

txt_en: You are free to choose your own path.
txt_cn: 你可以自由地选择自己的道路。

txt_en: The strongest person is the one who isn't scared to be alone.
txt_cn: 世界上最强大的人不惧孤独。
积极的思考带来更多的快乐。

txt_en: Human life is limited, and serving the people is infinite.
txt_cn: 人的生命是有限的，可是为人民服务是无限的。

txt_en: Whatever happens tomorrow, we have had today.
txt_cn: 不管明天会发生什么，至少我们拥有今天。

txt_en: Before finding the right person, the only thing you need to do is to make yourself good enough.
txt_cn: 在找到合适的人之前，你唯一需要做的，就是让自己足够优秀。

txt_en: The most alluring thing a woman can have is confidence.
txt_cn: 女性最有魅力的地方是自信。

txt_en: Food is worth more than gold.
It is always darkest just before the dawn.
If you are hopeful, you will be invincible.
txt_cn: 满怀希望，就会所向披靡。
